skills.title: Full-Stack Development
skills.description: End-to-end web application development from database to front-end deployment.

skills.title: Artificial Intelligence
skills.description: Integrate AI capabilities into applications such as image generation and chat automation using modern APIs.

skills.title: Machine Learning
skills.description: Creating intelligent features using Python and ML models for data-driven applications.

skills.title: Cloud & DevOps
skills.description: Hosting and deploying apps with Vercel, GitHub, and managing environments via Netlify or AWS.

portfolio.title: Result Analytics Dashboard
portfolio.description: A web app that visualizes student performance data and predicts academic outcomes using real-time charts and machine learning.

portfolio.title: Weather App
portfolio.description: A responsive web app built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that shows real-time weather data for any city using the OpenWeatherMap API.

portfolio.title: AI based image generator
portfolio.description: Built a full-stack AI image generator using React and OpenAI's DALL·E API to create images from text prompts.

achievements.title: 2nd Prize – Virtuosic Hackathon
achievements.description: Awarded 2nd place for Result Analytics Dashboard in Virtuosic Hackathon. Recognized for innovation in educational analytics during 2024 hackathon.

achievements.title: Research Paper – IEEE ICSSAS 2025
achievements.description: Published research on Result Analytics Dashboard Using Machine Learning at International Conference on Self Sustainable and Artificial Intelligence.
achievements.back: Paper accepted and published in IEEE Xplore, presented in Pune.
